metadata.title: Gourmia Digital Grill And Griddle Combo, One Size, Black
features: Grill and griddle: one wide surface, double the cooking. Grill burgers on the ribbed side, while flipping pancakes on the smooth side!
Digital control: easy to use, detachable LCD control panel. Features a choice of 8 temperatures up to 485°f, and timer setting of up to 60 minutes.
Drip tray: Extra large capacity to catch every drop of oily fat and grease- for completely clean cooking and smoke reduction.
Easy to clean: grilling surface, drip tray, and electronics all remove for safe and simple wash-up.
ETL certified: we, at Gourmia, take the quality of our products seriously. This product is ETL certified so you can be confident that you’re receiving a safe, efficient, high quality appliance.
description: this Gourmia GEG1800 Smokeless Digital Grill & Griddle will bring all the power and flavor of the classic backyard BBQ- right onto your kitchen countertop! Designed as one wide non-stick surface, with both ribbed and smooth textures. Flip your burgers on one side, and fry up an omelette on the other! Features include a fully detachable digital control panel with 8 different temperature presets up to 485°F, and timer setting of up to 60 minutes! The extra large drip tray catches every drop of oily fat and grease for completely clean cooking and smoke reduction. Easily disassembles for safe and simple wash-up. Check out the free E-Recipe Book for ideas on how you can easily grill up gourmet dishes like Personal Pizzas and Caramel S’mores!

mission is to make everyday cooking easy, healthy, and delicious. Our products deliver a higher standard of innovation, performance, and value. Our founders are experts in the modern world of small appliances and are passionate about providing our customers with dependable, efficient tools that will make life in the kitchen fun and easy.

title: Gourmia GEG1800 Digital Grill And Griddle Combo, One Size, Black
